GMTOOLKIT.Message.UnexpectedNoChange: Something unexpected happened. No change has been made.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.name: Clear Advantage for all tokens
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.hint: Tracked combatants (who appear in the Combat Tracker) always have their Advantage reset to 0 when combat ends. Select an option to additionally reset Advantage for all tokens in the viewed scene, including non-combatants, at the start and/or end of combat.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.both: At both start and end of encounter (default module behaviour)
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.start: At start of encounter only (on Begin Combat)
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.end: At end of encounter only (on End Combat)
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.clearAdvantage.never: Only combatants at end of encounter (default system behaviour)
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.TokenHudExtensions.En: Make tooltips and interactions for key attributes and skills available from the hud of controlled tokens. Enabled by default.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.TokenHudExtensions.Al: Always Show Initiative in Token Hud Extension
If disabled, Initiative and Agility tooltips and shortcuts are only available in active scenes. Enabled by default.
GMTOOLKIT.Token.Select: Please select one or more tokens first.
GMTOOLKIT.Token.SingleSelect: Please select a single token first.
GMTOOLKIT.Token.TargetPCs: Please target one or more PC tokens first.
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.SetVisionLight.Title: Set Token Vision and Light
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.Vision.NormalSight.hi: Maximum distance (yards) that a token without enhanced vision can see without an external light source in night or dim conditions.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.Vision.DarkVision.hin: Maximum distance (yards) that a token with the Dark Vision Trait can see without an external light source in night or dim conditions. Applied to token DimSight (and halved for BrightSight)
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.Vision.OverrideNightV: Apply Night Vision settings even if token does not have the Talent or Trait.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.Vision.OverrideDarkVi: Apply Dark Vision settings even if token does not have the Trait.
GMTOOLKIT.ResetFortune.NotPC: {targetName} is not a Player Character. No change made to Fortune points.
GMTOOLKIT.AddXP.Success:
Adding {XP} XP to {targetName}.

Total XP: {XPTotal} -> {newXPTotal} | Current XP: {XPCurrent} -> {newXPCurrent}.
GMTOOLKIT.AddXP.NotPC: {targetName} is not a Player Character. No change made to Experience Points.
GMTOOLKIT.Advantage.Max: {actorName} already has {startingAdvantage} of maximum {maxAdvantage} Advantage. No change made.
GMTOOLKIT.Advantage.None: {actorName} already has {startingAdvantage} Advantage. No change made.
GMTOOLKIT.Advantage.Cleared: Advantage has been cleared for all tokens in scene {sceneName}.
GMTOOLKIT.Scene.TokenNotGlobal: Token Vision is enabled and Global Illumination disabled in scene {sceneName}.
GMTOOLKIT.Scene.GlobalNotToken: Token Vision is disabled and Global Illumination enabled in scene {sceneName}.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.ScenePullActivate.hin: Activate the currently viewed scene when pulling everyone to it.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.ScenePullActivate.Nev: Never also activate scene (default module behaviour)
GMTOOLKIT.Message.ScenePullActivate.NoPe: Only GMs can pull players to scenes!
GMTOOLKIT.Message.ScenePullActivate.Pull: Characters have been pulled to {sceneName}. Scene is {sceneActiveState}.
GMTOOLKIT.Message.ScenePullActivate.Acti: Characters have been pulled to {sceneName} and scene has been activated.
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.ScenePullActivate.Title: Pull Everyone to Scene
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.ScenePullActivate.Promp: Do you want to activate the scene also?
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.AddXP.Default.name: Add XP
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.AddXP.Default.hint: Default amount of XP to add.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.AddXP.Prompt.name: Prompt for XP amount
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.AddXP.Prompt.hint: Always ask how many XP to add.
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.AddXP.Title: Add Experience Points
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.AddXP.InvalidXP: No change made. Add a valid number of XP. Fractions will be rounded to the nearest whole number. Negative numbers will be removed from the character's total.
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.SessionEnd.ExportChat: Prompt to save the chat log when running the End of Session Routine macro.
GMTOOLKIT.Message.SessionEnd.NoPermissio: Only GMs can administer end of session rites!
GMTOOLKIT.Settings.DarkWhispers.Filter.h: Set the default filter to select characters to receive a Dark Whisper. Override this by setting a parameter in the macro for 'all', 'present' or 'absent' party members.
GMTOOLKIT.Message.DarkWhispers.NoPermiss: Only GMs can send Dark Whispers!
GMTOOLKIT.Message.DarkWhispers.NoEligibl: No available characters have Corruption to exchange for a Dark Whisper.
GMTOOLKIT.Message.DarkWhispers.WhisperAb: So, Dark Whispers will not be heard at this time. Be silent for now, but do not call upon Dark Gods lightly, {currentUser}.
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.DarkWhispers.Title: Dark Whispers
GMTOOLKIT.Dialog.DarkWhispers.WhisperTar: Who have the Dark Gods chosen?
GMTOOLKIT.Message.DarkWhispers.Rejected: {currentUser} spurns the offer of the Dark Gods.
Choose the tone of Dark Whisper to suit your game.

The Dark Gods can see you are troubled.

For a discrete favour they can unburden you of 1 Corruption.

{message}

What harm can it do? Take the offer and step back from the brink of Chaos.

Dark Whispers Linger In Your Ears ...

Do not in any way reveal that you have received this message.

{message}

If you do as directed, your Corruption total will be reduced by 1.
GMTOOLKIT.Notification.NoActor: No Character is selected or associated with {currentuser}.
